title: Revealed: Full final policy platform set to shape next Labour manifesto - LabourList
summary: A. The article introduces the UK Labour Party's National Policy Forum (NPF) package of current policy stances as of early October 2023.  B. The 116-page document is divided into 6 sections: a green and digital future, better jobs and better work, safe and secure communities, public services that work from the start, a future where families come first, and Britain in the world.  C. The NPF policy is subject to change and will be voted on by Labour Party conference.
likely_naics_codes: ['921110 - Executive Offices', '921190 - Other General Government Support', '611430 - Professional and Management Development Training', '541930 - Translation and Interpretation Services']
greenwashing: The article is about policy stances on green innovation, business innovation, green products, and green processes. It is not about greenwashing.
